description: Create the ultimate chocolate hazelnut truffles with crushed Oreo cookies, Philadelphia cream cheese and Cadbury milk chocolate.
name: Oreo Chocolate Hazelnut Truffles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 270 g Oreo Double Stuff Choc Hazelnut Cookies
250 g Philadelphia Cream Cheese Original Block

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle truffles with reserved crushed cookies. Chill for 30 minutes or until set.
